pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President of the European Commission Jean-Claude Juncker | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Yesterday, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with Jean-Claude Juncker, President of the European Commission, to discuss recent developments related to global steel and aluminum trade.

They also spoke of their mutual concern regarding global overcapacity in the steel and aluminum industries and the urgent need to address this situation.

The Prime Minister and President Juncker agreed to stay in touch on how to continue defending the interests of Canadian and European businesses and workers.
